name: Djingareyber Mosque
description: A famous learning center of Timbuktu, it is one of the three great mosques of the city.

name: Sankore Mosque
description: Part of the University of Sankore, this mosque is another of Timbuktu's great centers of learning.

name: Sidi Yahya Mosque
description: The third of the great mosques of Timbuktu, known for its beautiful architecture.

name: Timbuktu Manuscripts
description: Ancient manuscripts that cover a wide range of subjects, from mathematics to astronomy.

name: Timbuktu Market
description: A bustling market where you can find local crafts, foods, and textiles.

name: The Explorers' Houses
description: The houses where famous explorers like René Caillié and Heinrich Barth stayed.

name: The Flame of Peace
description: A monument commemorating the end of the Tuareg Rebellion.

name: The Niger River
description: Enjoy a boat trip on the Niger River and experience the lifeblood of the region.
